function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 remaining viable and infectious in aerosols for hours","Impact":"Increased risk of aerosol transmission in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation, air filtration systems, and UV light disinfection","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, HEPA filters, UV-C disinfection devices","People":"Indoor occupants, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 persisting on surfaces for up to 4 days at room temperature","Impact":"Potential for fomite transmission leading to surface contamination","Mitigation":"Frequent disinfection of high-touch surfaces, use of antimicrobial materials, and hand hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Disinfectants, antimicrobial coatings, touchless fixtures","People":"Building occupants, visitors, cleaning staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, cleaning services"},{"Description":"Virus inactivation time reduced dramatically with an increase in incubation temperature","Impact":"Risk of virus spread in indoor environments with controlled temperatures","Mitigation":"Implementation of higher temperature environments, use of heat treatment and UV light disinfection","Technologies":"Temperature control systems, heat treatment equipment, UV-C disinfection devices","People":"Indoor occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, healthcare institutions"}]}
